prompt: Die Glocke oben rechts ist nicht verfügbar, auch nicht wenn die Erweiterung "Alert Notification" installiert ist.
expected_answer: Stellen Sie sicher, dass Benachrichtigungen in Ihrem Wiki aktiviert sind. Sie können sie aktivieren, indem Sie die Einstellung `notifications.enabled` in `xwiki.properties` auf `true` setzen.
ai_answer:
https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/XWikiSyntax/ 
https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/Features/ 


Es scheint, dass die Glocke für Benachrichtigungen in deiner XWiki-Installation nicht verfügbar ist, obwohl die Erweiterung "Alert Notification" installiert ist. Hier sind einige Schritte, die du überprüfen kannst:

1. **Erweiterung aktivieren**: Stelle sicher, dass die Erweiterung "Alert Notification" korrekt aktiviert ist. Du kannst dies in den Einstellungen der Erweiterung überprüfen.

2. **Benutzerrechte**: Überprüfe, ob du die erforderlichen Berechtigungen hast, um Benachrichtigungen zu sehen. Manchmal können Berechtigungen die Sichtbarkeit von Funktionen beeinflussen.

3. **Konfiguration**: Überprüfe die Konfiguration in der `xwiki.properties`-Datei, um sicherzustellen, dass die Benachrichtigungen nicht deaktiviert sind. Die Einstellung `notifications.enabled` sollte auf `true` gesetzt sein.

4. **Browser-Cache**: Manchmal kann es helfen, den Cache deines Browsers zu leeren oder die Seite neu zu laden, um sicherzustellen, dass alle Änderungen korrekt angezeigt werden.

5. **Kompatibilität**: Stelle sicher, dass die installierte Version der Erweiterung mit deiner Version von XWiki kompatibel ist.

Wenn diese Schritte nicht helfen, könnte es sinnvoll sein, die XWiki-Dokumentation oder die Community-Foren zu konsultieren, um spezifischere Unterstützung zu erhalten.

sources.content:
### Details of the changes

The changes are displayed in the email content:

![NotificationEmailDiff.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotificationEmailDiff.png?rev=1.4)

#### Select the level of details about the changes

In the user profile of the user, you can select the level of details that you receive on the email, about the changes that have happened to the wiki:

![UserProfile.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/UserProfile.png?rev=1.4)

The current choices are:

* **Standard**  
![DiffStandard.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/DiffStandard.png?rev=1.4)
* **Nothing**  
![EmailWithoutDiff.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/EmailWithoutDiff.png?rev=1.4)

## Macros for settings

The application proposes different wiki macros to handle the user's settings that could be called in many pages. These macros are:



| Macro Usage | Screenshot |
| --- | --- |
| {{notificationsEmailPreferences/}} | notificationsEmailPreferencesMacro.png |
| {{notificationsApplicationsPreferences/}} | notificationsApplicationsPreferencesMacro.png |
| XWiki <13.2 {{notificationsFiltersPreferences/}} | notificationsFiltersPreferencesMacro.png |
| XWiki 13.2+ {{notificationsSystemFiltersPreferences/}} | notificationsSystemFiltersPreferences.png |
| XWiki 13.2+ {{notificationsCustomFiltersPreferences/}} | notificationsCustomFiltersPreferences.png |

## Enable and disable the extension

The extension status can be toggled by editing the configuration variable "notifications.enabled" in xwiki.properties and restarting the server. 

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
# Notifications

## Get a notification RSS feed

You can get a RSS feed of the notifications occurring in your wiki. This feed can be accessed either through a link in your notification tray (or at the bottom of the notifications macro).

![NotificationTrayRSSLink.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotificationTrayRSSLink.png?rev=1.3)  
![NotificationsWithRSS.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotificationsWithRSS.png?rev=1.3)

## Notifications Macro

The [Notifications Macro is provided by its own application](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Macro/).

# Settings

On the notifications menu, you also have a link to go to the "settings" of the notifications.

![notif4.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notif4.png?rev=1.8)

By default, users only get notifications when they are mentioned or when actions are performed on pages they created or updated. For receiving other notifications, you need to select which "types" of notifications you want to receive. When a page is created? When a blog post is published?

You can enable or disable all notification types that belong to a particular application by clicking on the bells associated to this application. If some types are enabled and other are disabled inside an application, the switch looks like the next screenshot, meaning that the application's notifications are partially enabled:

![NotifUndeterminate.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotifUndeterminate.png?rev=1.3)

Note that you only receive notifications that occur after you turn on the notifications types.

| [notifications](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/Macro/NotificationsMacro) | Notifications | Notifications | Display notifications about events happened on the wiki. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsApplicationsPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsApplicationsPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Applications Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification applications. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsAutoWatchPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsAutoWatchPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Auto Watch Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about auto watched pages. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsCustomFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsCustomFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Custom Filters Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the given user about custom notification filters. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsEmailPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsEmailPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Email Preferences | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification emails. | Current Wiki |
| [notificationsFiltersPreferences](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Notifications/Code/NotificationsFiltersPreferencesMacro) | Notifications Filters Preferences (deprecated) | Notifications | Display the preferences of the current user about notification filters.This macro is now deprecated in favor of Custom Notifications Filters Preferences or System Notifications Filters Preferences. | Current Wiki |

## Emails

You can also select some types of notifications that you will receive by email. You can have different choices enabled by email and in the menu. Then, on the very bottom of the page, you can select the interval between 2 emails. For example, if you choose "Daily" (default), you will receive one email every day with the recap of the events that have happened during the day. Of course, if there were no activity in this period of time, no email is sent. 

Live notifications emails can be sent to a user. The wiki administrator can also define a "grace time" for live email notifications ; when an event that triggers a notification is sent, the platform will wait for the duration of this grace time before sending a notification email. If during this interval, a new event of the same kind is sent, the two events will be grouped in the same email. You can get more informations on how to configure this feature [here](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/#HCustomizeliveemailnotificationsgracetime).

Of course, it works only if the user has properly filled her e-mail address.

You can edit the frequency of your email notifications by using the selector just at the bottom of the notification preferences pane in your profile page :

![notificationPreferencesEmailUI.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/notificationPreferencesEmailUI.png?rev=1.4)

The notifications are sorted by pages and dates, and a table of content summarizes all notifications contained in the email:

![NotifEmailTOC.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotifEmailTOC.png?rev=1.3)

A breadcrumb is displayed on top of each notification that concern a page:

![NotifEmailBreadcrumb.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Notifications%20Application/WebHome/NotifEmailBreadcrumb.png?rev=1.3)

![text_list_bullets](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/text_list_bullets.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Menu](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Menu%20Application)  
Menu application

![bell](https://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/resources/icons/silk/bell.png?cache-version=1711538036000)

[Notifications](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Notifications%20Application/)  
Display notifications about events happening in the wiki.

![invitation.png](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/Invitation%20Application/invitation.png?rev=1.3)

[Invitation](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Invitation%20Application)  
Allows users to send emails, inviting friends and colleagues to join a wiki

# Other Features

Other features can be added to your wiki by [installing](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Extension%20Manager%20Application) extensions not listed above. Check the [Extensions wiki](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/) for a full list of available extensions.
